name: BEFORE LOVE WAS BLIND
description:
"Love is blind"  Have you ever wondered what does this mean? Or what did make love blind? Or, has love ever tried to get his vision back again? Discover the history of Love, and solve the mystery of Love's blindness in a journey in our Platformer Puzzle game. The adventure this game offers you will be unforgettable, especially with it's catchy story.
Collect the keys to open the door and go further in your journey.

Here are the Controls: 

(WASD - arrows) To Move

(SPACE) to change view 

(Up Arrow ) to jump 

Credits 

Unity engine as an engine

photoshop for art

bosca coeil for music

dragonbones for the animations
